page.title: 04Leisure in Woodham Ferrers
page.content: Radio listening is part of everyones' day. News programmes, weather forecasts, pop music, light comedies, drama, and soap operas (The Archers) are popular on the BBC. Commercial radio, Government approved Essex Radio and pirate stations play mostly music with local news information. Most houses have at least one colour or black and white set. Portable sets are given as birthday or Christmas presents and used in bedrooms by the young. Some sets are rented> TV is often watched at breakfast time. Childrens' favourites are cartoons, comedy, spooky films, magazine pprogrammes (Blue Peter, Wild Track). Adults like dramatic serials (soap operas) Dallas (American), Emmerdale Farm, Coronation Street, Dynasty (American), Eastenders, sport, crime, situation comedies, drama.
